name: Divine Order
trigger: when you choose your divine order
effects: Protector: you gain proficiency with Martial weapons and training with Heavy armor
Thaumaturge: you learn one extra cleric cantrip and gain a bonus to Intelligence (Arcana or Religion) checks equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum +1)
